name: Heaven's Hearts
description:
Controls:
Enter = Start
WSAD = Move
V= Fire
C = Alt-fire

Created for GBJAM 9; where the challenge was to abide by the limitations of the original GameBoy

  • 4 colors palette
  • 8-bit audio
  • 160x144 resolution.
  • Up, Down, Left, Right, A and B only

The idea was essentially to recreate one of my favorite games, Devil Daggers, in 2D. I think the result is okay. I would like to have had more enemies before the deadline.
